Articles.Content: So after playing career full stock for a while but I decide to install mech jeb for my career play through which I'm about halfway done with the tech tree but noticed that when I tried to launch a craft with mj it was missing a few features like reandevouz autopilot docking auto pilot ascent guidance along with a few others. Now where these features taken out just for that section of the tree and are something to unlock later Or are they gone for good
